definitions.definition: why you do something or why something exists:
examples: The purpose of the research is to try to find out more about the causes of the disease.

definitions.definition: If you do something on purpose, you do it intentionally, not by accident:
examples: I didn't do it on purpose - it was an accident.

definitions.definition: determination or a feeling of having a reason for what you do:
examples: I've always admired her for her strength of purpose.
We haven't yet managed to find new premises that are suitable for our purposes.
These small village shops serve a very useful purpose.
